section.name: Intro
section.p: This document describes the configuration file used by mod_jk2 on the Tomcat site. Its default name is ${jkHome}/conf/jk2.properties, where ${jkHome} is the well known ${catalina.base} property.

section.name: Config File Format
section.p:
settings are specified in the following format:
handler.propertie=value

tr.td: Define the class of the handler myhandler.
